Name: Adaptability
Description: Powers up moves of the same type.
Effect: Adaptability increases the effectiveness of STAB moves from the usual 1.5× to 2×.

Name: Aerilate
Description: Turns Normal-type moves into Flying-type moves.
Effect: Aerilate causes all Normal-type attacking moves used by the Pokémon to become Flying-type, and increase in power by 20%.

Name: Aftermath
Description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.
Effect: If an attacker faints a Pokémon with Aftermath using a contact move, the attacker will lose 1⁄4 of their maximum HP.

Name: Air Lock
Description: Eliminates the effects of weather.
Effect: Air Lock suppresses all effects brought on by weather, including move power increases, end-of-turn damage, accuracy changes, relevant abilities and so on.

Name: Analytic
Description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
Effect: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

Name: Anger Point
Description: Maxes Attack after taking a critical hit.
Effect: Anger Point raises the ability-bearer's Attack to its maximum level - +6 stages or 4× usual power - when a move targeting it receives a critical hit.

Name: Anger Shell
Description: Lowers Defense/Sp. Def and raises Attack/Sp. Atk/Speed when HP drops below half.
Effect: When the Pokémon's HP drops below half, Anger Shell lowers its Defense and Special Defense but its Attack, Special Attack and Speed are raised.

Name: Anticipation
Description: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.
Effect: A Pokémon with Anticipation will shudder upon entering battle, if an opponent has a move that is super-effective against it, or a One-Hit-KO move (Fissure, Horn Drill, Guillotine or Sheer Cold). It only activates when the ability-bearer switches in, not when an opponent switches in.

Name: Arena Trap
Description: Prevents the foe from fleeing.
Effect: Arena Trap prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out. Raised Pokémon are not affected.

Name: Armor Tail
Description: Prevents opponent using priority moves.
Effect: Armor Tail prevents the opponent from using any moves that have priority, such as Quick Attack.

Name: Aroma Veil
Description: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.
Effect: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

Name: As One
Description: Combines Unnerve and Chilling Neigh/Grim Neigh
Effect: Combines Unnerve and Chilling Neigh/Grim Neigh

Name: Aura Break
Description: Reduces power of Dark- and Fairy-type moves.
Effect: Aura Break cancels the effects of the abilities Fairy Aura and Dark Aura and instead reduces the power of Dark-type and Fairy-type moves by 25%, for all Pokémon on the field.

Name: Bad Dreams
Description: Reduces a sleeping foe's HP.
Effect: Bad Dreams causes all sleeping opponents to lose 1⁄8 of their maximum HP at the end of each turn.

Name: Ball Fetch
Description: Retrieves a Poké Ball from a failed throw.
Effect: If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the Poké Ball from the first failed throw of the battle.

Name: Battery
Description: Raises power of teammates' Special moves.
Effect: Battery allows the Pokémon to raise the power of teammates' special moves.

Name: Battle Armor
Description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.
Effect: Battle Armor prevents the Pokémon from receiving a critical hit.

Name: Battle Bond
Description: Transform into Ash-Greninja after causing opponent to faint.
Effect: Battle Bond causes Greninja to transform into Ash-Greninja when it KOs an opponent.

Name: Beads of Ruin
Description: Lowers Special Defense of all Pokémon except itself.
Effect: Lowers Special Defense of all Pokémon except itself.

Name: Beast Boost
Description: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.
Effect: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.

Name: Berserk
Description: Raises Special Attack when HP drops below half.
Effect: Berserk raises the Pokémon's Special Attack by one stage when its HP falls below 50%.

Name: Big Pecks
Description: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.
Effect: Big Pecks prevents the ability-bearer's Defense stat from being lowered, for example via Tail Whip.

Name: Blaze
Description: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.
Effect: Blaze increases the power of Fire-type moves by 50% (1.5×) when the ability-bearer's HP falls below a third of its maximum (known in-game as in a pinch).

Name: Bulletproof
Description: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.
Effect: Bulletproof makes the Pokémon immune to ball and bomb moves.

Name: Cheek Pouch
Description: Restores additional HP when a Berry is consumed.
Effect: Cheek Pouch restores the bearer's HP when a Berry is consumed, on top of the berry's usual effects.

Name: Chilling Neigh
Description: Boosts Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.
Effect: Boosts Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.

Name: Chlorophyll
Description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.
Effect: Chlorophyll doubles the ability-bearer's Speed during bright sunshine.

Name: Clear Body
Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
Effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

Name: Cloud Nine
Description: Eliminates the effects of weather.
Effect: Cloud Nine suppresses all effects brought on by weather, including move power increases, end-of-turn damage, accuracy changes, relevant abilities and so on.

Name: Color Change
Description: Changes the Pokémon's type to the foe's move.
Effect: Color Change changes the ability-bearer's type, when hit by a damage dealing move, to the type of that move. For example being hit by X Scissor will change the Pokémon to Bug-type. Dual-type Pokémon change to single-types.

Name: Comatose
Description: The Pokémon is always asleep but can still attack.
Effect: Comatose causes the Pokémon to behave as if it were asleep, though it doesn't officially have the Sleep status condition. It can still use its regular moves, but cannot be inflicted with any major status condition (sleep, poison, paralysis, burn, or freeze).

Name: Commander
Description: Goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field.
Effect: Goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field.

Name: Competitive
Description: Sharply raises Special Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.
Effect: Competitive raises the ability-bearer's Special Attack by two stages when hit by a stat-lowering move.

Name: Compound Eyes
Description: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.
Effect: Compound Eyes raises the ability-bearer's accuracy by 30%.

Name: Contrary
Description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
Effect: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

Name: Corrosion
Description: The Pokémon can poison Steel and Poison types.
Effect: Corrosion allows the bearer to poison any Pokémon, including Steel and Poison types.

Name: Costar
Description: Copies ally's stat changes on entering battle.
Effect: Copies ally's stat changes on entering battle.

Name: Cotton Down
Description: Lowers foe's Speed when hit.
Effect: When a Pokémon with Cotton Down is hit by an attack, it lowers the attacker's Speed.

Name: Cud Chew
Description: Can eat the same Berry twice.
Effect: Cud Chew causes the Pokémon to reuse an already consumed Berry at the end of the next turn.

Name: Curious Medicine
Description: Resets all stat changes upon entering battlefield.
Effect: Resets all stat changes upon entering battlefield.

Name: Cursed Body
Description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
Effect: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

Name: Cute Charm
Description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.
Effect: If a Pokémon with Cute Charm is hit by a move that makes contact, there is a 30% chance the attacker will become infatuated. It will not infatuate Pokémon of the same gender, genderless Pokémon, nor those with the ability Oblivious.

Name: Damp
Description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.
Effect: Damp prevents all Pokémon on the field from using the moves Selfdestruct and Explosion. It also prevents damage (to the Damp Pokémon only) from the ability Aftermath.

Name: Dancer
Description: Copies the foe's Dance moves.
Effect: When another Pokémon on the field uses any Dance move, Dancer causes the ability-bearer to use that same move immediately afterward. They will still use their own move originally selected, at the usual time (e.g. after the opponent if they are slower).

Name: Dark Aura
Description: Raises power of Dark type moves for all Pokémon in battle.
Effect: Dark Aura raises the power of Dark-type moves by 33% for all Pokémon on the field (not just the ability-bearer).

Name: Dauntless Shield
Description: Boosts Defense in battle.
Effect: Boosts Defense in battle.

Name: Dazzling
Description: Protects the Pokémon from high-priority moves.
Effect: Dazzling makes the Pokémon immune to high-priority moves (i.e. those with a priority above 0).

Name: Defeatist
Description: Lowers stats when HP drops below half.
Effect: When the HP of a Pokémon with Defeatist falls below 50%, its Attack and Special Attack stats are halved.

Name: Defiant
Description: Sharply raises Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.
Effect: Defiant raises the ability-bearer's Attack by two stages when hit by a stat-lowering move.

Name: Delta Stream
Description: Creates strong winds when the ability activates.
Effect: Delta Stream creates strong winds when the ability is activated (by Rayquaza Mega-Evolving).

Name: Desolate Land
Description: Turns the sunlight extremely harsh when the ability activates.
Effect: Desolate Land creates extremely harsh sunlight when the ability is activated (by Groudon reverting to its Primal form).

Name: Disguise
Description: Avoids damage for one turn.
Effect: Disguise allows the bearer to avoid damage for one attack, in a similar way to Substitute.

Name: Download
Description: Adjusts power according to a foe's defenses.
Effect: Download raises either the bearer's Attack or Special Attack by one stage when switching into battle, base on the opponent's defenses.

Name: Dragon's Maw
Description: Powers up Dragon-type moves.
Effect: Dragon's Maw increases the power of Dragon-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.

Name: Drizzle
Description: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.
Effect: Drizzle creates a rain shower when the ability-bearer enters battle. The effect lasts 5 turns, unless it is cleared via Air Lock or Cloud Nine or replaced by another weather condition.

Name: Drought
Description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Effect: Drought creates harsh sunlight when the ability-bearer enters battle. The effect lasts 5 turns, unless it is cleared via Air Lock or Cloud Nine or replaced by another weather condition.

Name: Dry Skin
Description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.
Effect: Dry Skin causes several effects:

Name: Early Bird
Description: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.
Effect: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

Name: Earth Eater
Description: Restores HP when hit by a Ground-type move.
Effect: Restores HP when hit by a Ground-type move.

Name: Effect Spore
Description: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.
Effect: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

Name: Electric Surge
Description: The Pokémon creates an Electric Terrain when it enters a battle.
Effect: Electric Surge creates a low-lying electric field, like the move Electric Terrain, when the Pokémon enters battle. It prevents grounded Pokémon from falling asleep, and increases the power of Electric type attacks.

Name: Electromorphosis
Description: Doubles power of the next Electric-type move when hit by an attack.
Effect: If a Pokémon with Electromorphosis is hit by an attack, the power of the next Electric-type move it uses is doubled.

Name: Emergency Exit
Description: Switches out when HP falls below 50%.
Effect: Switches out when HP falls below 50%.

Name: Fairy Aura
Description: Raises power of Fairy type moves for all Pokémon in battle.
Effect: Fairy Aura raises the power of Fairy-type moves by 33%, for all Pokémon on the field (not just the ability-bearer).

Name: Filter
Description: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks.
Effect: Filter reduces the damage taken from super-effective attacks by 25%.

Name: Flame Body
Description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
Effect: If a Pokémon with Flame Body is hit by a move that makes contact, there is a 30% chance the attacker will become burned.

Name: Flare Boost
Description: Powers up special attacks when burned.
Effect: Powers up special attacks when burned.

Name: Flash Fire
Description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
Effect: When a Pokémon with Flash Fire is hit by a Fire-type move, it does not deal damage but instead raises the power of the bearer's Fire-type moves by 50%. Subsequent hits do not raise the power even more, but the effect remains while the ability-bearer is in battle.

Name: Flower Gift
Description: Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.
Effect: Flower Gift raises the Attack and Special Defense of all party Pokémon by 50% during harsh sunlight.

Name: Flower Veil
Description: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon's stats.
Effect: Flower Veil prevents ally Grass-type Pokémon's stats from being lowered, in double and triple battles.

Name: Fluffy
Description: Halves damage from contact moves, but doubles damage from Fire-type moves.
Effect: Fluffy reduces damage from contact moves by 50%, but Fire-type moves do double damage. Fire-type moves that make contact do regular damage.

Name: Forecast
Description: Castform transforms with the weather.
Effect: Castform transforms with the weather.

Name: Forewarn
Description: Determines what moves a foe has.
Effect: Determines what moves a foe has.

Name: Friend Guard
Description: Reduces damage done to allies.
Effect: Reduces damage done to allies.

Name: Frisk
Description: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.
Effect: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

Name: Full Metal Body
Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
Effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

Name: Fur Coat
Description: Reduces damage from physical moves.
Effect: Fur Coat reduces damage taken from physical attacks by 50%.

Name: Gale Wings
Description: Gives priority to Flying-type moves.
Effect: Gives priority to Flying-type moves.

Name: Galvanize
Description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves and their power boosted.
Effect: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves and their power boosted.

Name: Gluttony
Description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
Effect: A Pokémon with Gluttony will use a pinch berry when its HP drops to 50%, rather than the usual 25%.

Name: Good as Gold
Description: Gives immunity to status moves.
Effect: Gives immunity to status moves.

Name: Gooey
Description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
Effect: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

Name: Gorilla Tactics
Description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.
Effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.

Name: Grass Pelt
Description: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.
Effect: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

Name: Grassy Surge
Description: The Pokémon creates a Grassy Terrain when it enters a battle.
Effect: Grassy Surge creates a low-lying grassy field, like the move Grassy Terrain, when the Pokémon enters battle. It restores the HP of grounded Pokémon each turn and increases the power of Grass type attacks.

Name: Grim Neigh
Description: Boosts Special Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.
Effect: Boosts Special Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.

Name: Guard Dog
Description: Boosts Attack if intimidated, and prevents being forced to switch out.
Effect: Boosts Attack if intimidated, and prevents being forced to switch out.

Name: Gulp Missile
Description: Returns with a catch in its mouth after using Surf or Dive.
Effect: Gulp Missile is the signature ability of Cramorant. If Cramorant uses the move Surf or Dive, it returns with a fish in its mouth. If Cramorant then takes damage, it retaliates by spitting out the fish, dealing extra damage.

Name: Guts
Description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.
Effect: Guts raises the ability-bearer's Attack by 50% when inflicted by a major status ailment (poison, burn, paralysis, freeze or sleep). If burnt, the Pokémon does not suffer the usual drop in Attack.

Name: Hadron Engine
Description: Creates an Electric Terrain when entering battle, and boosts Special Attack while active.
Effect: Creates an Electric Terrain when entering battle, and boosts Special Attack while active.

Name: Harvest
Description: May create another Berry after one is used.
Effect: May create another Berry after one is used.

Name: Healer
Description: May heal an ally's status conditions.
Effect: May heal an ally's status conditions.

Name: Heatproof
Description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.
Effect: Heatproof reduces the damage taken from Fire-type moves by 50%. It also halves the damage from a burn, from 1⁄8 to 1⁄16 of the Pokémon's maximum HP.

Name: Heavy Metal
Description: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.
Effect: Heavy Metal doubles the Pokémon's weight in battle. Increasing weight affects these moves:

Name: Honey Gather
Description: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.
Effect: Honey Gather has no effect in battle.

Name: Huge Power
Description: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.
Effect: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.

Name: Hunger Switch
Description: Changes forms each turn.
Effect: Hunger Switch causes Morpeko to change its form each turn, alternating between Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode. Morpeko's form also changes the type of its signature move, Aura Wheel.

Name: Hustle
Description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
Effect: Hustle increases the ability-bearer's Attack by 50%, however, it also reduces the Accuracy of all Physical moves by 20%.

Name: Hydration
Description: Heals status problems if it is raining.
Effect: A Pokémon with Hydration will cure itself of any status conditions during rain, at the end of each turn. This includes self-inflicted conditions such as from using Rest.

Name: Hyper Cutter
Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.
Effect: Hyper Cutter prevents the bearer's Attack stat from being lowered by other Pokémon, through moves such as Growl or abilities such as Intimidate.

Name: Ice Body
Description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.
Effect: A Pokémon with Ice Body will recover 1⁄16 of its maximum HP during hail, after each turn. It also grants immunity to the hailstorm damage, if not already immune.

Name: Ice Face
Description: Avoids damage from Physical moves for one turn.
Effect: Ice Face is the signature ability of Eiscue. It allows the Pokémon to take a physical attack without taking damage. After the attack, Eiscue changes to its No Ice Face form, however, it can be restored in hail.

Name: Ice Scales
Description: Halves damage from Special moves.
Effect: Halves damage from Special moves.

Name: Illuminate
Description: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.
Effect: Illuminate has no effect in battle.

Name: Illusion
Description: Enters battle disguised as the last Pokémon in the party.
Effect: When a Pokémon with the Illusion ability switches into battle, it takes the form of the Pokémon in last place (6th) of the player's party. Illusion will not activate if the Pokémon in last place is the same species or is fainted.

Name: Immunity
Description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.
Effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

Name: Imposter
Description: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.
Effect: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.

Name: Infiltrator
Description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.
Effect: Infiltrator ignores the effects of Reflect, Light Screen and Safeguard. In other words, if the opponent has used Safeguard, Toxic would still badly poison them.

Name: Innards Out
Description: Deals damage upon fainting.
Effect: When a Pokémon with Innards Out faints, it deals damage to the opponent equal to amount of damage it took on the final blow.

Name: Inner Focus
Description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.
Effect: Inner Focus prevents the Pokémon from flinching, for example when attacked by a move like Headbutt.

Name: Insomnia
Description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.
Effect: Insomnia prevents the ability-bearer from falling asleep, both from moves by other Pokémon like Sing, and self-inflicted sleep like Rest.

Name: Intimidate
Description: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.
Effect: Intimidate lower's the Attack of all opponents by one stage when the ability-bearer switches in (including the start of a battle).

Name: Intrepid Sword
Description: Boosts Attack in battle.
Effect: Boosts Attack in battle.

Name: Iron Barbs
Description: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.
Effect: When a Pokémon with Iron Barbs is hit by a move that makes contact, the attacker receives damage equal to 1⁄8 of their maximum HP.

Name: Iron Fist
Description: Boosts the power of punching moves.
Effect: Iron Fist increases the power of all punching moves by 20%.

Name: Justified
Description: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.
Effect: Justified raises the ability-bearer's Attack by one stage when hit by a damaging Dark-type move.

Name: Keen Eye
Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.
Effect: Keen Eye prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy, for example from moves like Sand-Attack.

Name: Klutz
Description: The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Effect: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

Name: Leaf Guard
Description: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.
Effect: Leaf Guard prevents the bearer from succumbing to major status ailments (sleep, burns, poisoning, paralysis or freezing) during sunny weather.

Name: Levitate
Description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.
Effect: Levitate causes the Pokémon to be raised (like Flying-type Pokémon).

Name: Libero
Description: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.
Effect: Libero changes the Pokémon's type to that of its previously used attack.

Name: Light Metal
Description: Halves the Pokémon's weight.
Effect: Light Metal halves the Pokémon's weight in battle. Decreasing weight affects these moves:

Name: Lightning Rod
Description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.
Effect: Lightning Rod forces all single-target Electric-type moves - used by any other Pokémon on the field - to target this Pokémon, and with 100% accuracy. This includes the status move Thunder Wave. The ability is most useful in double/triple battles.

Name: Limber
Description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.
Effect: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

Name: Lingering Aroma
Description: Contact changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.
Effect: Contact changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.

Name: Liquid Ooze
Description: Damages attackers using any draining move.
Effect: Damages attackers using any draining move.

Name: Liquid Voice
Description: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
Effect: Liquid Voice causes all sound-based moves used by the Pokémon to become Water type. Water type Pokémon also gain STAB from those moves.

Name: Long Reach
Description: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.
Effect: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

Name: Magic Bounce
Description: Reflects status- changing moves.
Effect: Reflects status- changing moves.

Name: Magic Guard
Description: Protects the Pokémon from indirect damage.
Effect: Magic Guard protects the Pokémon from indirect damage, including:

Name: Magician
Description: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.
Effect: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

Name: Magma Armor
Description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.
Effect: Magma Armor prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen, for example from moves like Blizzard.

Name: Magnet Pull
Description: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping.
Effect: Magnet Pull prevents Steel type Pokémon from switching out of battle or fleeing.

Name: Marvel Scale
Description: Ups Defense if there is a status problem.
Effect: Marvel Scale raises the ability-bearer's Defense by 50% when inflicted by a major status ailment (poison, burn, paralysis, freeze or sleep).

Name: Mega Launcher
Description: Boosts the power of aura and pulse moves.
Effect: Mega Launcher increases the power of all aura and pulse moves by 50%. Heal Pulse boosts the HP restored by 50%.

Name: Merciless
Description: The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.
Effect: The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

Name: Mimicry
Description: Changes type depending on the terrain.
Effect: Changes type depending on the terrain.

Name: Minus
Description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
Effect: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

Name: Mirror Armor
Description: Reflects any stat-lowering effects.
Effect: Reflects any stat-lowering effects.

Name: Misty Surge
Description: The Pokémon creates a Misty Terrain when it enters a battle.
Effect: Misty Surge creates a low-lying mist, like the move Misty Terrain, when the bearer enters battle. It protects all grounded Pokémon from status conditions and halves the power of Dragon type attacks.

Name: Mold Breaker
Description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.
Effect: Mold Breaker prevents a target's ability from affecting moves that the Mold Breaker Pokémon uses. It only affects abilities that change the power, accuracy or other effects of moves.

Name: Moody
Description: Raises one stat and lowers another.
Effect: Raises one stat and lowers another.

Name: Motor Drive
Description: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.
Effect: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

Name: Moxie
Description: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.
Effect: Moxie increases the user's Attack one stage upon fainting an opponent.

Name: Multiscale
Description: Reduces damage when HP is full.
Effect: Reduces damage when HP is full.

Name: Multitype
Description: Changes type to match the held Plate.
Effect: Multitype changes the ability-bearer's type if it is holding one of the Type Plate items. Moves of the corresponding type receive STAB.

Name: Mummy
Description: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.
Effect: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.

Name: Mycelium Might
Description: Status moves go last, but are not affected by the opponent's ability.
Effect: Status moves go last, but are not affected by the opponent's ability.

Name: Natural Cure
Description: All status problems heal when it switches out.
Effect: All status problems heal when it switches out.

Name: Neuroforce
Description: Powers up moves that are super effective.
Effect: Powers up moves that are super effective.

Name: Neutralizing Gas
Description: Neutralizes abilities of all Pokémon in battle.
Effect: Neutralizes abilities of all Pokémon in battle.

Name: No Guard
Description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.
Effect: No Guard ensures that all attacks used by, and targeted at, the ability-bearer hit without fail.

Name: Normalize
Description: All the Pokémon's moves become the Normal type.
Effect: Normalize causes all moves used by the Pokémon to become Normal-type, and attacking moves increase in power by 20%.

Name: Oblivious
Description: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.
Effect: Oblivious makes the Pokémon immune to gender-based moves and abilities, specifically Attract, Captivate and Cute Charm.

Name: Opportunist
Description: Copies stat boosts by the opponent.
Effect: Copies stat boosts by the opponent.

Name: Orichalcum Pulse
Description: Turns the sunlight harsh when entering battle, and boosts Attack while active.
Effect: Turns the sunlight harsh when entering battle, and boosts Attack while active.

Name: Overcoat
Description: Protects the Pokémon from weather damage.
Effect: Overcoat makes the Pokémon immune to residual damage from weather conditions (specifically Hail and Sandstorm).

Name: Overgrow
Description: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.
Effect: Overgrow increases the power of Grass-type moves by 50% (1.5×) when the ability-bearer's HP falls below a third of its maximum (known in-game as in a pinch).

Name: Own Tempo
Description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.
Effect: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

Name: Parental Bond
Description: Allows the Pokémon to attack twice.
Effect: Parental Bond allows the ability-bearer to attack twice. The second attack hits with 25% of the power, so in effect it is equivalent to a 25% boost to all attacks.

Name: Pastel Veil
Description: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from being poisoned.
Effect: Pastel Veil prevents the Pokémon and its teammates from being poisoned. It also cures teammates of poisoning when it enters the battlefield.

Name: Perish Body
Description: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.
Effect: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.

Name: Pickpocket
Description: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.
Effect: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

Name: Pickup
Description: The Pokémon may pick up items.
Effect: When another Pokémon on the field uses a single-use held item, a Pokémon with Pickup will obtain the used item (if they are not already holding anything) and it can be used again.

Name: Pixilate
Description: Turns Normal-type moves into Fairy-type moves.
Effect: Pixilate causes all Normal-type attacking moves used by the Pokémon to become Fairy-type, and increase in power by 20%.

Name: Plus
Description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
Effect: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

Name: Poison Heal
Description: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
Effect: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

Name: Poison Point
Description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.
Effect: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

Name: Poison Touch
Description: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.
Effect: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

Name: Power Construct
Description: Changes form when HP drops below half.
Effect: Power Construct is unique to Zygarde. When Zygarde 10% Forme or Zygarde 50% Forme falls below half HP, it changes into Zygarde Complete Forme.

Name: Power of Alchemy
Description: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.
Effect: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

Name: Power Spot
Description: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.
Effect: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

Name: Prankster
Description: Gives priority to a status move.
Effect: Prankster increases the priority of status moves by +1.

Name: Pressure
Description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.
Effect: Pressure makes any attack targeted at the ability-bearer - regardless of whether it hits - use 2 PP instead of 1.

Name: Primordial Sea
Description: Makes it rain heavily when the ability activates.
Effect: Primordial Sea creates heavy rain when the ability is activated (by Kyogre reverting to its Primal form).

Name: Prism Armor
Description: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks.
Effect: Prism Armor reduces the damage taken from super-effective attacks by 25%. It is not affected by the abilities Mold Breaker, Teravolt, or Turboblaze.

Name: Propeller Tail
Description: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.
Effect: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.

Name: Protean
Description: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.
Effect: Protean changes the Pokémon's type to that of its previously used attack.

Name: Protosynthesis
Description: Raises highest stat in harsh sunlight, or if holding Booster Energy.
Effect: Raises highest stat in harsh sunlight, or if holding Booster Energy.

Name: Psychic Surge
Description: The Pokémon creates a Psychic Terrain when it enters a battle.
Effect: Psychic Surge creates a low-lying psychic field, like the move Psychic Terrain, when the Pokémon enters battle. It prevents high-priority moves being used and increases the power of Psychic type attacks.

Name: Punk Rock
Description: Boosts sound-based moves and halves damage from the same moves.
Effect: Boosts sound-based moves and halves damage from the same moves.

Name: Pure Power
Description: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.
Effect: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.

Name: Purifying Salt
Description: Protects from status conditions and halves damage from Ghost-type moves.
Effect: Protects from status conditions and halves damage from Ghost-type moves.

Name: Quark Drive
Description: Raises highest stat on Electric Terrain, or if holding Booster Energy.
Effect: Raises highest stat on Electric Terrain, or if holding Booster Energy.

Name: Queenly Majesty
Description: Prevents use of priority moves.
Effect: Prevents use of priority moves.

Name: Quick Feet
Description: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.
Effect: Quick Feet raises the ability-bearer's Speed by 50% when inflicted by a major status ailment (poison, burn, paralysis, freeze or sleep). If paralyzed, the Pokémon does not suffer the usual drop in Speed.

Name: Rain Dish
Description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.
Effect: A Pokémon with Rain Dish will recover 1⁄16 of its maximum HP during rain, after each turn.

Name: Rattled
Description: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.
Effect: When a Pokémon with Rattled is hit by a Bug, Ghost or Dark type move, its Speed is raised one stage (up to the usual maximum of +6 stages).

Name: Receiver
Description: Inherits an ally's ability when it faints.
Effect: A Pokémon with Receiver will inherit the ability of a teammate in a double/triple battle when that teammate faints.

Name: Reckless
Description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
Effect: Reckless increases the power of recoil moves by 20%. By extension, this means the amount of recoil damage taken will increase as more damage is dealt (except for High Jump Kick and Jump Kick which are based on the user's HP).

Name: Refrigerate
Description: Turns Normal-type moves into Ice-type moves.
Effect: Refrigerate causes all Normal-type attacking moves used by the Pokémon to become Ice-type, and increase in power by 20%.

Name: Regenerator
Description: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
Effect: A Pokémon with Regenerator restores 1⁄3 of its maximum HP when switching out.

Name: Ripen
Description: Doubles the effect of berries.
Effect: Doubles the effect of berries.

Name: Rivalry
Description: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.
Effect: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

Name: RKS System
Description: Changes type depending on held item.
Effect: Changes type depending on held item.

Name: Rock Head
Description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
Effect: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

Name: Rocky Payload
Description: Powers up Rock-type moves.
Effect: Rocky Payload increases the power of Rock-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.

Name: Rough Skin
Description: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.
Effect: When a Pokémon with Rough Skin is hit by a move that makes contact, the attacker receives damage equal to 1⁄8 of their maximum HP.

Name: Run Away
Description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
Effect: Run Away allows the bearer to flee a battle with a wild Pokémon without fail, even if the opposing Pokémon has used a move like Mean Look or Bind, or has an ability such as Arena Trap.

Name: Sand Force
Description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.
Effect: Sand Force raises the power of Ground, Rock and Steel type moves by 30% during a sandstorm.

Name: Sand Rush
Description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.
Effect: Sand Rush doubles the ability-bearer's Speed during a sandstorm.

Name: Sand Spit
Description: Creates a sandstorm when hit by an attack.
Effect: Creates a sandstorm when hit by an attack.

Name: Sand Stream
Description: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.
Effect: Sand Stream creates a sandstorm when the ability-bearer enters battle. The effect lasts 5 turns, unless it is cleared via Air Lock or Cloud Nine or replaced by another weather condition.

Name: Sand Veil
Description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.
Effect: Sand Veil raises the ability-bearer's evasion by 20% in a sandstorm. It also gives immunity to sandstorm damage (if they are not already protected by being Ground/Rock/Steel type).

Name: Sap Sipper
Description: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.
Effect: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

Name: Schooling
Description: Changes Wishiwashi to School Form.
Effect: Schooling changes Wishiwashi into its School Form, if its HP is above 25% and Wishiwashi is at least level 20. If its HP falls below 25%, Wishiwashi will revert back to Solo Form.

Name: Scrappy
Description: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.
Effect: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

Name: Screen Cleaner
Description: Nullifies effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.
Effect: Nullifies effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.

Name: Seed Sower
Description: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.
Effect: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

Name: Serene Grace
Description: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.
Effect: Serene Grace doubles the chance of moves' secondary effects occurring - specifically stat changes, status ailments, or flinching. It also increases the chance of flinching due to the held items King's Rock and Razor Fang from 10% to 20% (however, note that those items do not affect moves that already have a flinch chance).

Name: Shadow Shield
Description: Reduces damage when HP is full.
Effect: Reduces damage when HP is full.

Name: Shadow Tag
Description: Prevents the foe from escaping.
Effect: Prevents the foe from escaping.

Name: Sharpness
Description: Powers up slicing moves.
Effect: Powers up slicing moves.

Name: Shed Skin
Description: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.
Effect: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

Name: Sheer Force
Description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.
Effect: Sheer Force increases the power of moves that have beneficial secondary effects by 30%, but removes those additional effects.

Name: Shell Armor
Description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.
Effect: Shell Armor prevents the Pokémon from receiving a critical hit.

Name: Shield Dust
Description: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.
Effect: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

Name: Shields Down
Description: Changes stats when HP drops below half.
Effect: Shields Down causes the Pokémon to changes its appearance and stats depending on its remaining HP.

Name: Simple
Description: Doubles all stat changes.
Effect: The Simple ability doubles the number of stages of all stat changes. Stats can be raised to a maximum of +6 stages each, or lowered to a minimum of -6 stages each.

Name: Skill Link
Description: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.
Effect: Skill Link causes multi-strike moves to always hit their maximum number of times. The moves affected are listed below; note that moves such as Double Kick that always strike the same number of times are not affected.

Name: Slow Start
Description: Temporarily halves Attack and Speed.
Effect: Temporarily halves Attack and Speed.

Name: Slush Rush
Description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.
Effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.

Name: Sniper
Description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.
Effect: Sniper increases the power of critical hits by 1.5×. This means a critical hit will deal 2.25× normal damage instead of 1.5×.

Name: Snow Cloak
Description: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.
Effect: Snow Cloak raises ability-bearer's evasion by 20% in a hail storm. It also gives immunity to damage by hail (if they are not already protected by being Ice type).

Name: Snow Warning
Description: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.
Effect: Snow Warning creates a hailstorm when the ability-bearer enters battle. The effect lasts 5 turns, unless it is cleared via Air Lock or Cloud Nine or replaced by another weather condition.

Name: Solar Power
Description: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.
Effect: During harsh sunlight, Solar Power raises the ability-bearer's Special Attack by 50%, but it also loses 1⁄8 of its maximum HP after each turn.

Name: Solid Rock
Description: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks.
Effect: Solid Rock reduces the damage taken from super-effective attacks by 25%.

Name: Soul-Heart
Description: Raises Special Attack when an ally faints.
Effect: Soul-Heart raises the bearer's Special Attack one stage when a teammate faints.

Name: Soundproof
Description: Gives immunity to sound-based moves.
Effect: Soundproof grants the Pokémon immunity to all sound-based moves, preventing all damage and effects.

Name: Speed Boost
Description: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.
Effect: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

Name: Stakeout
Description: Deals double damage to Pokémon switching in.
Effect: Stakeout enables the Pokémon to deal twice the normal damage to any Pokémon that switches in or enters the field mid-battle.

Name: Stall
Description: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Effect: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.

Name: Stalwart
Description: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.
Effect: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.

Name: Stamina
Description: Raises Defense when attacked.
Effect: Stamina raises the bearer's Defense by one stage when it is attacked by any move.

Name: Stance Change
Description: Changes form depending on moves used.
Effect: Stance Change is exclusive to Aegislash. When using a damage-dealing move, Aegislash switches to its Blade Forme. When using the move King's Shield, Aegislash switches to its Shield Forme.

Name: Static
Description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.
Effect: If a Pokémon with Static is hit by a move making contact, there is a 30% chance the foe will become paralyzed.

Name: Steadfast
Description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.
Effect: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

Name: Steam Engine
Description: Drastically raises Speed when hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.
Effect: Steam Engine raises the user's Speed by three stages when it is hit by a Fire- or Water-type attack. The attack still deals damage.

Name: Steelworker
Description: Powers up Steel-type moves.
Effect: Steelworker increases the power of Steel-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.

Name: Steely Spirit
Description: Powers up ally Pokémon's Steel-type moves.
Effect: Powers up ally Pokémon's Steel-type moves.

Name: Stench
Description: The stench may cause the target to flinch.
Effect: A Pokémon with Stench has a 10% chance of causing the opponent to flinch when hit by a damaging move (provided the ability-bearer strikes first as usual).

Name: Sticky Hold
Description: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.
Effect: Sticky Hold prevents held items from being taken or switched.

Name: Storm Drain
Description: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.
Effect: Storm Drain forces all single-target Water-type moves - used by any other Pokémon on the field - to target this Pokémon, and with 100% accuracy. The ability is most useful in double/triple battles.

Name: Strong Jaw
Description: Boosts the power of biting moves.
Effect: Strong Jaw increases the power of all biting moves by 50%.

Name: Sturdy
Description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.
Effect: Sturdy allows the Pokémon to survive with 1 HP if attacked at full HP with an attack that would otherwise knock it out. It also prevents One-Hit-KO moves (Fissure, Horn Drill, Guillotine or Sheer Cold).

Name: Suction Cups
Description: Negates all moves that force switching out.
Effect: Suction Cups prevents opponents forcing the ability-bearer to switch out or flee via the moves Roar, Whirlwind, Circle Throw, or Dragon Tail, or the item Red Card.

Name: Super Luck
Description: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.
Effect: Super Luck raises the ability-bearer's critical-hit ratio by one stage (for most moves this increases from a 1⁄16 chance to 1⁄8).

Name: Supreme Overlord
Description: Attack and Special Attack are boosted for each party Pokémon that has been defeated.
Effect: Attack and Special Attack are boosted for each party Pokémon that has been defeated.

Name: Surge Surfer
Description: Doubles Speed during Electric Terrain.
Effect: Surge Surfer doubles the bearer's Speed when Electric Terrain is active.

Name: Swarm
Description: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.
Effect: Swarm increases the power of Bug-type moves by 50% (1.5×) when the ability-bearer's HP falls below a third of its maximum (known in-game as in a pinch).

Name: Sweet Veil
Description: Prevents the Pokémon and allies from falling asleep.
Effect: Sweet Veil prevents this Pokémon and its allies from falling asleep, for example from moves like Hypnosis.

Name: Swift Swim
Description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.
Effect: Swift Swim doubles the ability-bearer's Speed during rain.

Name: Sword of Ruin
Description: Lowers Defense of all Pokémon except itself.
Effect: Lowers Defense of all Pokémon except itself.

Name: Symbiosis
Description: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.
Effect: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

Name: Synchronize
Description: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.
Effect: If the opponent causes a burn, paralysis, or poisoning of a Pokémon with Synchronize, the opponent receives the status condition too. Self-inflicted status conditions (for example through the use of an item) are not passed on.

Name: Tablets of Ruin
Description: Lowers Attack of all Pokémon except itself.
Effect: Lowers Attack of all Pokémon except itself.

Name: Tangled Feet
Description: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.
Effect: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

Name: Tangling Hair
Description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
Effect: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

Name: Technician
Description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
Effect: Technician increases the power of moves - that are usually base power 60 or below - by 50%.

Name: Telepathy
Description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.
Effect: Pokémon with the Telepathy ability will not take damage from teammates in double and triple battles.

Name: Teravolt
Description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.
Effect: Teravolt prevents a target's ability from affecting moves that the Teravolt Pokémon uses. It only affects abilities that change the power, accuracy or other effects of moves.

Name: Thermal Exchange
Description: Raises Attack when hit by a Fire-type move. Cannot be burned.
Effect: Raises Attack when hit by a Fire-type move. Cannot be burned.

Name: Thick Fat
Description: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.
Effect: Thick Fat reduces the damage taken from Fire-type and Ice-type moves by 50%.

Name: Tinted Lens
Description: Powers up “not very effective” moves.
Effect: Powers up “not very effective” moves.

Name: Torrent
Description: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.
Effect: Torrent increases the power of Water-type moves by 50% (1.5×) when the ability-bearer's HP falls below a third of its maximum (known in-game as in a pinch).

Name: Tough Claws
Description: Boosts the power of contact moves.
Effect: Tough Claws increases the power of moves that make contact.

Name: Toxic Boost
Description: Powers up physical attacks when poisoned.
Effect: Powers up physical attacks when poisoned.

Name: Toxic Debris
Description: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.
Effect: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.

Name: Trace
Description: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.
Effect: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.

Name: Transistor
Description: Powers up Electric-type moves.
Effect: Transistor increases the power of Electric-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.

Name: Triage
Description: Gives priority to restorative moves.
Effect: Triage increases the priority of HP-restoring moves to +3, when used by the ability-bearer.

Name: Truant
Description: Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns.
Effect: Truant causes the ability-bearer to only attack every alternate turn. On the even turns, it will say the Pokémon is loafing around.

Name: Turboblaze
Description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.
Effect: Turboblaze prevents a target's ability from affecting moves that the Turboblaze Pokémon uses. It only affects abilities that change the power, accuracy or other effects of moves.

Name: Unaware
Description: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.
Effect: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.

Name: Unburden
Description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.
Effect: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

Name: Unnerve
Description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.
Effect: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

Name: Unseen Fist
Description: Contact moves can strike through Protect/Detect.
Effect: Contact moves can strike through Protect/Detect.

Name: Vessel of Ruin
Description: Lowers Special Attack of all Pokémon except itself.
Effect: Lowers Special Attack of all Pokémon except itself.

Name: Victory Star
Description: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
Effect: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

Name: Vital Spirit
Description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.
Effect: Vital Spirit prevents the ability-bearer from falling asleep. This means that it also prevents the use of the move Rest.

Name: Volt Absorb
Description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.
Effect: A Pokémon with Volt Absorb heals 1⁄4 of its maximum HP when hit by an Electric-type attack, including Thunder Wave.

Name: Wandering Spirit
Description: Swaps abilities with opponents on contact.
Effect: Swaps abilities with opponents on contact.

Name: Water Absorb
Description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.
Effect: A Pokémon with Water Absorb heals 1⁄4 of its maximum HP when hit by a Water-type attack.

Name: Water Bubble
Description: Halves damage from Fire-type moves, doubles power of Water-type moves used, and prevents burns.
Effect: Water Bubble reduces damage taken from Fire-type moves by 50%, and doubles the power of Water-type moves used by the ability-bearer. It also prevents the Pokémon from being burned.

Name: Water Compaction
Description: Sharply raises Defense when hit by a Water-type move.
Effect: Water Compaction raises the bearer's Defense by 2 stages when it is hit by a Water-type move.

Name: Water Veil
Description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
Effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

Name: Weak Armor
Description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.
Effect: When a Pokémon with Weak Armor is hit by a physical move, its Defense drops one stage, but its Speed increases by one stage.

Name: Well-Baked Body
Description: Immune to Fire-type moves, and Defense is sharply boosted.
Effect: Immune to Fire-type moves, and Defense is sharply boosted.

Name: White Smoke
Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
Effect:
Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
Outside of battle
If a Pokémon with White Smoke is the leading party Pokémon, wild Pokémon are only half as likely to appear.

Name: Wimp Out
Description: Switches out when HP drops below half.
Effect: Wimp Out causes the bearer to switch out (or flee in a wild battle) when its HP falls below 50%.

Name: Wind Power
Description: Doubles power of the next Electric-type move used, when hit by a wind move.
Effect: If a Pokémon with Wind Power is hit by a wind move, the power of the next Electric-type move it uses is doubled.

Name: Wind Rider
Description: Takes no damage from wind moves, and boosts Attack if hit by one.
Effect: Wind Rider gives immunity to wind moves, and causes the Pokémon's Attack to increase by one stage when hit by one.

Name: Wonder Guard
Description: Only supereffective moves will hit.
Effect: Wonder Guard prevents damage from direct attacks unless they are super-effective. Shedinja is the only Pokémon to have this ability so this means that only Fire, Flying, Rock, Ghost and Dark moves will have an effect.

Name: Wonder Skin
Description: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.
Effect: Wonder Skin halves the accuracy of all status moves targeted at the ability-bearer.

Name: Zen Mode
Description: Changes form when HP drops below half.
Effect: Zen Mode changes the ability-bearer's form to Zen Mode when their health falls below 50%.

Name: Zero to Hero
Description: Transforms into its Hero Form when switching out.
Effect: Transforms into its Hero Form when switching out.
